definition: Li He (790-816), Tang poet and author of 南园十三首

sentences.english: Li He's life transient, but full of legendary flavour.
sentences.chinese: 李贺一生是短促的，又是充满传奇色彩的。

sentences.english: That is the reason for Li He's acceptance of Chuci.
sentences.chinese: 李贺对楚辞的接受也包括这两个方面。

sentences.english: Li He was a poet peculiar to the middle of Tang Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 李贺是中唐时代一位独特的诗人。

sentences.english: Why Li He died at the age of 27 has been a mystery.
sentences.chinese: 李贺27岁而没，其死因至今是一个谜。

definition: Lu Zhaolin (637-689), one of the Four Great Poets of the Early Tang 初唐四傑|初唐四杰[Chu1 Tang2 Si4 jie2]
Du Fu (712-770), great Tang dynasty poet

Wang Bo (650-676), one of the Four Great Poets of the Early Tang 初唐四傑|初唐四杰[Chu1 Tang2 Si4 jie2]
Yang Jiong (650-693?), one of the Four Great Poets of the Early Tang 初唐四傑|初唐四杰[Chu1 Tang2 Si4 jie2]
Zhang Ruoxu (c. 660-720), Tang dynasty poet, author of yuefu poem River on a spring night 春江花月夜
Meng Jiao (751-814), Tang dynasty essayist and poet
